title: Mouse Cursor
body: can i get banned for changing my in game mouse cursor to something more visible http://pandateemo.github.io/YoloMouse/ such as this website where its free and easy to do so please let me know i dont wanna get banned thank you.

replies.body: Unless it's offering an unfair advantage in-game, it's not something we would ban you for.  That can change at anytime, though!  We don't support third party programs or modifications, and can't support you if something goes wrong or something malicious was hiding inside.  Be wary!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=TquVvsTs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-03T19:21:07.359+0000)
>
> Unless it's offering an unfair advantage in-game, it's not something we would ban you for.  That can change at anytime, though!  We don't support third party programs or modifications, and can't support you if something goes wrong or something malicious was hiding inside.  Be wary!

alright thank you
